column1:
In  an  inquiry 
into  an  application  to  set  aside  an  ex-parte 
decree'
the Court should ascertain whether there were reasonable grounds

for  default  and  should  be  mindful 
that 
in  proceedings  of  this

nature, 
the  provisions  of  chapter  XII  of  the  Code  are  statutorily
enacted  proceedings  where  consequences  of  default  and  cure  are

enumerated independent of 
the  main  case  based  on 
rights  of
